text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Warhol's photo legacy spread by university exhibits
text.summary: A new exhibit of Andy Warhol's Polaroids and prints at the University of Southern Indiana is running from January 23 to March 9, 2014, featuring roughly 100 polaroids donated by the Andy Warhol Foundation, an installation of balloons called Silver Clouds, an installation taking Polaroid pictures of visitors, and Warhol themed food and music.
